fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Muse about a player at night. You'll make up your mind and commit to killing them at some point.
- Rethink a player at night. You'll think about their good traits and decide not to kill them after all. You may perform this ability on the same night as one of your others, with the highest priority.
- Act on your inner desires, attacking everyone who you've committed to killing.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When converted, you retain your murderous thoughts about previous players.
- If a player thinks about targeting you at night, but changes their target, you will be informed of their identity, and can choose whether or not to attack them tonight. This is in addition to your normal attack, and can happen multiple times.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Unseen except the s is pronounced like an s
